summary.para: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the qualified resources that are defined in the manifest.

param.name: resources
param.para: The enumerator that iterates through the qualified resources.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

remarks.para: Resources are specified using the Resources element in the manifest.
Call the method when you have finished using the resources object.

summary.para: Represents an object model of the package manifest that provides methods to access manifest elements and attributes.

remarks.para: Note Starting with Windows 8.1, we recommend not to use anymore to only iterate over the Language values in the manifest. Instead, use IAppxManifestReader2.GetResources because it iterates over other resource qualifiers as well, such as, Scale and DXFeatureLevel.
